meanings.sent1: The befogged student struggled to understand the math problem.
meanings.sent2: Her befogged mind couldn't make sense of the complicated instructions.
meanings.sent3: The befogged cat tried to chase its own tail, thinking it was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: His befogged thoughts were like a tangled ball of yarn, impossible to unravel.
meanings.sent5: The befogged memories of the old man slowly cleared as he sipped his tea.

meanings.sent1: The befogged mountain peak disappeared behind a thick layer of clouds.
meanings.sent2: The befogged forest looked mysterious and enchanting in the early morning mist.
meanings.sent3: The befogged mirror reflected a distorted image of the room.
meanings.sent4: The befogged lake seemed to merge with the sky, creating a surreal landscape.
meanings.sent5: The befogged glasses made everything appear blurry and indistinct to the old man.
